column2: "Iyinom so nye Solomon ne mbɛbusɛm a Judahen Hezekia ne mbarimba fae kyerɛwee."
"Ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn n'enyimnyam dɛ ɔkata adze do: Na ahemfo hɔn enyimnyam nye dɛ wɔmpɛnsapɛnsa asɛm mu."
"Mbrɛ ɔsor no krɔn a ɔkrɔn
column3: na asaase no dɔ a ɔdɔ tse no: Dɛmara na ahemfo akoma nnyi mpɛnsampɛnsamu."

column2: "Yi dwetɛ mu fi no
column3: Na egudze fi odwimfo hɔ bopue:"

column2: "Yi omumuyɛnyi fi ɔhen enyim
column3: Na n'ahengua betsim ndzeyɛtsenenee mu."

column2: "Mma nnhyehyɛ woho wɔ ɔhen enyim
column3: Na mma nnkegyina ekunyin ananmu:"

column2: "Na oye dɛ wɔbɛse wo dɛ
column3: Bra sor ha; Sen dɛ wɔbɛbrɛ wo adze wɔ ɔhen a W'enyiwa tua no no enyim."

column2: "Mma mmpɛ ntsɛm mmfir edzi nnkɔko
column3: Ɔno bɛyɛ na irunnhu mbrɛ n'ewiei no ebɛyɛ
column4: Ber a wo nyɛnko egu w'enyim ase no."

column2: "Enye wo nyɛnko noara ndzi w'asɛm a enye no wɔ dzi no
column3: Na mma nnda esumasɛm edzi nkyerɛ obi."

column2: "Amma nyia ɔbɛtse no aannyeyaw wo
column3: Na wo nsopaa annyɛ kɛse."

column2: "Asɛm a wɔka no enyiwa do no
column3: Ɔtse dɛ sika eduaba a ɔwɔ dwetɛ kɛntsɛn mu."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ sika asowamuadze
column3: na sika mapa ntweaban tse no
column4: Dɛmara so na onyimkafo onyansafo tse ma asowa a ɔyɛ setsie."

column2: "Mbrɛ otwaber mu nsukwankyɛba n'awɔw tse no
column3: Dɛmara so na ɔbɔfo nokwafo tse ma hɔn a wɔsoma no; Osiandɛ ɔdwedwe no wuranom hɔn kra."

column2: "Mbrɛ nsuwusiw na mframa a ɔnntɔ nsu tse no
column3: Dɛmara so na nyia ɔdze akyɛdze hun tuw noho no tse."

column2: "Abotaryɛ tsentsen na wɔdze dan ɔtsɛmbufo n'adwen
column3: Na tɛkyerɛma bɔkɔɔ bubu mbiew."

column2: "Ana enya ewo? Dzi dodow a ɔbɔso wo; Amma eennyi wo
column3: na aammfe enngu."

column2: "Mma mma wo nan nnyɛ wo nyɛnko fie ntsiantsia; Amma wo ho aannyɛ no mfon
column3: na oeennkyir wo."

column2: "Nyimpa a odzi ne nyɛnko ho dasewia no
column3: Ɔyɛ dua hamɛr

column2: "Ndabrabanyi no mu awerɛhyɛmu wɔ ɔfona da mu
column3: Ɔtse dɛ ese a ebu

column2: "Mbrɛ obi a oyi noho efuradze wɔ awɔwber mu
column3: na mbrɛ pirakur do nsayerɛyerɛw tse no
column4: Dɛmara na nyia ɔtow ndwom kyerɛ awerɛhow akoma tse."

column2: "Sɛ ɔkɔm dze wo tamfo a
column3: ma no edziban ma ondzi; Na sɛ nsukɔm dze no a

column2: "Na ɔwo ebɔsɔ gyansenama egu n'etsifi
column3: Na EWURADZE bɛhyɛ wo ananmu."

column2: "Kwaamu ehum dze nyankom ba: Dɛmara so na nsekubɔ tɛkyerɛma dze ebufuhyew ba."
"Dan etsifi duodoo mu ne tsena ye Sen dɛ enye ɔbaa a ohwinhwin bɛtsena dan kɛse mu."
"Mbrɛ nsu nwin tse ma ɔkra a ɔrehaahaw no
column3: Mbrɛ nsɛmpa a ofi ekyirekyir man mu tse ara nye no."

column2: "Mbrɛ nsunyiwa a afon
column3: na mbasu a asɛɛ tse no
column4: Dɛmara so na ɔtseneneenyi a ogyaa mu ma emumuyɛfo tse."

column2: "Ewo pii ne dzi nnye: Dɛm ntsi enyimnyam a adasa wɔhwehwɛ ma hɔnho no
column3: ɔnnyɛ enyimnyam."

column2: "Nyia onntum nnhyɛ noho do no
column3: Ɔtse dɛ kuropɔn a edwuruw na onnyi fasu."
